类型: Color: Crystal Tea/Gold MirrorLens Width: 51 Millimeters
评论详情: These sunglasses are light. When I first picked them up I thought "cheap." But once I really looked at them and put them on I realized these sunglasses have quality way above their price. Wearing them and feeling the comfort with the light weight and spring hinges surprised me. And I love the way they look and make even me look a little bit cool. The tint of the lenses is not too dark and the surface seems to have a slight reflective coating. Overall, an excellent pair of sunglasses, especially at this price.

I highly recommend and plan to purchase another pair.

I was surprised by how nice these sunglasses are. They're a great deal for the price. They are light and very flexible. Sometimes I get a headache from glasses when the arms are too tight and press against my head. I don't have that issue at all with these sunglasses. They're not too big and not too small, and I believe they'll be flattering on a lot of people. They look and feel more expensive than they actually are. Also, the color on this one is described as half "yellow." I would say it's a very earthy type of yellow, almost a tan yellow, not like bright canary yellow.

类型: Color: Crystal Tea/Gold MirrorLens Width: 51 Millimeters
评论详情: The ZENOTTIC Polarized Round Sunglasses are a solid choice if just want something that looks good and gets the job done. The classic round frame gives them a stylish vibe, and the UV400 lenses keep your eyes safe from the sun. The polarized lenses are a huge plus too, cutting down glare—perfect for things like fishing or just hanging out in the sun. They're super lightweight, which makes them really comfortable to wear, though they might feel a little on the cheaper side because of that. But for the price, it’s not really an issue.  All in all, these sunglasses strike a pretty good balance between style, protection, and affordability.

I ordered the Grey Demi version of these sunglasses and they are quite unique.  The frames are a light grey and tortoise shell coloring that I haven't seen anywhere else - or on anyone else.  The shape is a slightly large round eye piece with narrow side ear pieces.  The lenses are a rosy medium brown and make the view bright.

My wife is attempting to stall eye surgery for cataracts and we have been stashing sunglasses so she has a set whenever venturing outside during the day.  As an engineer, she lets me purchasing things for her.In this set, I like the circular lens as it inherently has less potential for optical distortion.  There is less metal in the construction of the hinges than I had hoped after looking at ad pictures.  The hinges do incorporate spring mechanisms, which should provide wearer comfort and assist in keeping the frames on when bent over.  My wife finds them attractive and comfortable.

These are really cute and I wear them constantly BUT they do have their issues.  1st of all from what I can tell they do have UV protection, which is always a concern for these cheaper sunglasses. So points for that. They even come with a little card you can use to test them and I've tried it with other sunnies I have and it seems legit to my uninformed self.  2nd the plastic or whatever they are made of is so cheap feeling. It's extremely lightweight and makes a strange sound when you tap your nails on the plastic for instance. I have many sunnies and these seem the "cheapest". The hinges though, are pretty good. You can wiggle them around in either direction so they seem to be less fragile in that regard. Again, they are very cute so I will deal with this stuff no problem.  Finally, I don't think I have a big head. Typically sunnies feel like they're too big for my face or I always just wish they were a bit smaller. We'll, these ones are pretty small! I can see my eyebrows while wearing them and the bows actually have to stretch out a little to fit around my head. Felt weird at first but now I'm used to it and I really like the size.  If you like small sunnies or have a smaller head I would definitely say give these a try.

评论概述: Those are good sunglasses, but, not all designs have the same quality
评论详情: I bought these sunglasses https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BGNTPXWS?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details  I had previously bought another pair for my wife (from the same provider and brand) and they were perfect in terms of protection, price and quality. Just as expected. The previous purchase was: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BGNQCP5X/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o07_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1  If you take a close look, in both links, glasses look pretty much the same. Same price, same brand, same shape, same characteristics, just different color (I wanted a different color).  In this second purchase I have received a lower quality glasses. Those are the color I wanted and are truly polarized, but are not the shape nor the quality that I expected: Plastic feels weaker and screws and joints are not flexible.  Check the photographs and compare with the model. Thank you
